info.description: Channels User Administration - Holdings APIs are used to create online service arrangements containing privileges, permissions for Channel users. Online Service Arrangements are CUSTOMER specific, personalized instances of a Online Service Product, for example, providing access to the Online Banking.
info.title: Channels User Administration

get.summary: Retrieves Online Service Arrangements created for customer
get.description: Retrieves online service arrangement for a customer, supports various selection filters like customerId, arrangementId, status, product and etc.

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an arrangement contract.

parameters.name: arrangementStatus
parameters.description: Status of the arrangement. E.g. AUTH, CLOSE, UNAUTH etc.

parameters.name: masterOnly
parameters.description: Contains flag value to retrieve Online Service master contracts.

parameters.name: roleOnly
parameters.description: Contains flag value to retrieve Online Service role contracts or sub contracts.

parameters.name: productGroupId
parameters.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: subArrangementName
parameters.description: The name of the sub arrangement that is displayed.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

post.description: Validates Online Service Arrangement request, this is mainly used before creating the arrangement

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: arrangementActivityId

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an arrangement contract.

get.summary: Retrieves the list of customer holdings for a Product Group
get.description: Retrieves the list of accounts, loans, deposits and other holdings for a customer based on the Product Group

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: productGroupId
parameters.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

parameters.name: allowedProducts
parameters.description: Product or products allowed to be used within the product bundle.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: onlineServicesProductId
parameters.description: Identifier of Online Service product, for eg: Retail Online Service, Corporate Online Server and etc..

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

id.description: The identifier of the override

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

properties.description: Input is the valid field name for the metrics evaluation of alerts

propertyId.description: The identifier of the product condition

overrides.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

masterArrangementId.description: The unique identifier to specify an arrangement reference which is act as a Master for the arrangement being created.

roleName.description: Name of the role or sub contract that is displayed, for eg: Payments Inputter, Administrator, Clerk and etc.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

customers.description: Contains the customer identifier to fetch list of consent arrangements for the customer or customer identifier of the debtor account. This will be populated once the SCA(Strong Customer Authentication) is completed.

customer.description: Contains the customer identifier to fetch list of consent arrangements for the customer or customer identifier of the debtor account. This will be populated once the SCA(Strong Customer Authentication) is completed.

customerRole.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

taxLiabilityPercentage.description: Tax liability percentage of the customer

limitAllocactionPercentage.description: Indicates percentage of limit allocated to the customer out of overall limit

GLAllocactionPercentage.description: Indicates GL allocation percentage of the customer

jointLiability.description: Identifies if there is a joint liability on the limit record Allowed values: -YES -NO

definedCustomer.description: Allowed customers for the selected arrangement; where in they can see their product in Internet Banking

definedCustomerSel.description: Available accounts for the allowed customer will be displayed if this field is set as Yes .If set as No, accounts will not be available

definedCompany.description: Allowed company for the defined customer

definedProductGroups.description: Product groups that can be accessed by external users via a specific Online Services product

definedProductGroupSel.description: Level of permission defined for the product group

relCustomers.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

relationCustomer.description: Customers linked or related to the arrangement owner

productGroups.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

productGroupSel.description: Level of permission applicable for the associated Product groups; Possible values: Exclude, See, Transact

product.description: Indicates an id or name of a product

productSel.description: Level of permission applicable for the associated Products; Possible values: Exclude, See, Transact

masterLevelChange.description: Marker to identify whether changes made at Master Arrangement level

services.description: Identifies the required operation to be executed for a Trade Finance contract. Input of valid codes as: O for opening of LC, P for Pre-advise of LC, A for Amend LC, C for Collect Charges, D for Decision on Amendments, T for Tracer, IO for LC through Internet Banking Operation and M for Ancillary Message (MT759)

serviceId.description: Contains the identifier name of the service that has to be executed.

serviceActive.description: Indicate whether service is active or not.

operationId.description: ID of the operation which Identifies the required operation to be executed for a Trade Finance contract.

operationActive.description: Indiciate whether operation is active or not

masterLevelChange.description: Marker to identify whether changes made at Master Arrangement level

daySelect.description: Allowed days to access Internet Banking

startTime.description: Contains the time job was started

endTime.description: Contains the time the job  ended.

masterLevelChange.description: Marker to identify whether changes made at Master Arrangement level

system.description: List of system ids that the protection limit applies to

systemId.description: The system application identifier from which the entry was generated

applicationId.description: Contains the application id of the service that has crashed due to error.

transaction.description: List of transaction types; that the protection limit applies to

type.description: The product condition has an activity type associated that drives an action.

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

benRiskRate.description: List of Beneficiary risk rate that the protection limit applies to

definedCustomer.description: Allowed customers for the selected arrangement; where in they can see their product in Internet Banking

customerLimit.description: Contains Limit allocated value for the customer defined in the online service contract.

utilisationReset.description: Specifies whether the limit utilisation reset takes place as the calendar date or at close of business.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

usageUpdate.description: Contains flag value to define whether the limit update happens at input or authorisation of transaction.

customerMaximumLimit.description: Contains Maximum limit value that can be assigned to the customers defined in the online service contract .

noOfUsers.description: The maximum number of users that can be linked to a master arrangement or its roles

noOfRoles.description: The maximum number of roles that can be linked to the master arrangement

aaaId.description: The Identifier of the aa record created

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

customer.description: Contains the customer identifier to fetch list of consent arrangements for the customer or customer identifier of the debtor account. This will be populated once the SCA(Strong Customer Authentication) is completed.

customerRole.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

taxLiabilityPercentage.description: Tax liability percentage of the customer

limitAllocactionPercentage.description: Indicates percentage of limit allocated to the customer out of overall limit

GLAllocactionPercentage.description: Indicates GL allocation percentage of the customer

jointLiability.description: Identifies if there is a joint liability on the limit record Allowed values: -YES -NO

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

definedCustomer.description: Allowed customers for the selected arrangement; where in they can see their product in Internet Banking

definedCustomerSel.description: Available accounts for the allowed customer will be displayed if this field is set as Yes .If set as No, accounts will not be available

definedCompany.description: Allowed company for the defined customer

definedProductGroups.description: Product groups that can be accessed by external users via a specific Online Services product

definedProductGroupSel.description: Level of permission defined for the product group

relCustomers.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

relationCustomer.description: Customers linked or related to the arrangement owner

productGroups.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

productGroupSel.description: Level of permission applicable for the associated Product groups; Possible values: Exclude, See, Transact

product.description: Indicates an id or name of a product

productSel.description: Level of permission applicable for the associated Products; Possible values: Exclude, See, Transact

masterLevelChange.description: Marker to identify whether changes made at Master Arrangement level

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

services.description: Identifies the required operation to be executed for a Trade Finance contract. Input of valid codes as: O for opening of LC, P for Pre-advise of LC, A for Amend LC, C for Collect Charges, D for Decision on Amendments, T for Tracer, IO for LC through Internet Banking Operation and M for Ancillary Message (MT759)

serviceId.description: Contains the identifier name of the service that has to be executed.

serviceActive.description: Indicate whether service is active or not.

operationId.description: ID of the operation which Identifies the required operation to be executed for a Trade Finance contract.

operationActive.description: Indiciate whether operation is active or not

masterLevelChange.description: Marker to identify whether changes made at Master Arrangement level

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

daySelect.description: Allowed days to access Internet Banking

startTime.description: Contains the time job was started

endTime.description: Contains the time the job  ended.

masterLevelChange.description: Marker to identify whether changes made at Master Arrangement level

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

system.description: Name of the application or virtual table

systemId.description: The system application identifier from which the entry was generated

applicationId.description: Contains the application id of the service that has crashed due to error.

transaction.description: List of transaction types; that the protection limit applies to

type.description: The product condition has an activity type associated that drives an action.

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

benRiskRate.description: List of Beneficiary risk rate that the protection limit applies to

definedCustomer.description: Allowed customers for the selected arrangement; where in they can see their product in Internet Banking

customerLimit.description: Contains Limit allocated value for the customer defined in the online service contract.

utilisationReset.description: Specifies whether the limit utilisation reset takes place as the calendar date or at close of business.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

usageUpdate.description: Contains flag value to define whether the limit update happens at input or authorisation of transaction.

customerMaximumLimit.description: Contains Maximum limit value that can be assigned to the customers defined in the online service contract .

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

noOfUsers.description: The maximum number of users that can be linked to a master arrangement or its roles

noOfRoles.description: The maximum number of roles that can be linked to the master arrangement

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

products.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

productPermission.description: Type of permission applicable for products

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

linkedSubArrangementId.description: Unique identification number for the Sub-arrangement (Role)

linkedSubArrangementName.description: Name of the sub Arrangement or Role

audit.description: The user identifier who input the transaction

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

inputterId.description: The user identifier Id who input the transaction

inputterName.description: The user identifier name who input the transaction

arrangementId.description: The unique identifier of an arrangement contract.

arrangementStatus.description: Status of the arrangement. E.g. AUTH, CLOSE, UNAUTH etc.

subArrangementName.description: The name of the sub arrangement that is displayed.

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

masterArrangementId.description: The unique identifier to specify an arrangement reference which is act as a Master for the arrangement being created.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

pendingActivityId.description: ID of the arrangement activity which is pending to be authorised

externalUserId.description: Contains the external user identifier for which the consent is created.

externalUserName.description: External or Digital Channel User Name

arrangementId.description: The unique identifier of an arrangement contract.

subArrangementName.description: The name of the sub arrangement that is displayed.

externalUserStatus.description: External User Access status. Can be Active,  Inactive, Barred, Initiated

usersCount.description: Number of External Users assigned based on the given parameter

usersTotalCount.description: Number of External Users for the entire arrangement, regardless of their role allocation

userLicensesCount.description: Maximum allowed number of users based on the Licensing property class

subArrangementsCount.description: Number of roles attached to the Master Arrangement

subArrangementLicensesCount.description: Maximum allowed number of roles based on the Licensing property class

customerRole.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

productLineId.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

productLineName.description: Description of the product line, e.g. Client Consent for product line CONSENT.

subArrangementName.description: The name of the sub arrangement that is displayed.

arrangementStatus.description: Status of the arrangement. E.g. AUTH, CLOSE, UNAUTH etc.

masterArrangementId.description: The unique identifier to specify an arrangement reference which is act as a Master for the arrangement being created.
